paragraphs: The annual street sculpture festival Sculpture Line 2024 has kicked off in Prague. Within its framework, 36 works by Czech and foreign artists have been installed in various locations around the city. Some of them have already been seen by the residents of Prague, while others are being exhibited for the first time.
The festival will last until the end of the year, after which most of the sculptures will be removed. You can view the coordinates and description of each of them at this link.
The festival also takes place in some other cities in the Czech Republic, but on a much smaller scale.
Subscribe to our Telegram channel by following the link: t.me/vinegret_cz
